entries.title: Mandy Moore and Her Family Struck by Hit-and-Run Driver
entries.content: Mandy Moore had a big scare this week after her family’s car was rear-ended by a hit-and-run driver. The This Is Us alum, 41, shared the news via Instagram Stories on Friday, August 1, condemning the behavior of the motorist who drove off. “To the woman who rear-ended my family and then drove off as...
